title: South Africa investigates "sharp increase" in hospitalized children with COVID
content:
1. South Africa investigates "sharp increase" in hospitalized children with COVID  CBS News
  2. 'Unprecedented' Omicron Surge in South Africa Is Hitting Children Under Age 5  The Daily Beast
  3. Omicron covid variant three times more likely to cause reinfection than delta, South Africa study says  Yahoo News

  5. Omicron 3 times more likely to cause reinfection than previous COVID variants: researchers  Fox News
